name: Tek Syndicate - Darker
description: Mostly just inverts the main container area.
additional_info:
March 29, 2015 - Tweaked a few colors and some code cleanup.

March 7, 2015 - Darkened Login Notification Box. 

March 1, 2015 - Stopped Theme from being applied to the new forum.

Feb. 21, 2015 - Fixed white (hidden) font when posting a comment using Firefox. Few other color fixes.

Feb. 18, 2015 - Fixed line through Feed Title when logged in and hidden text in homepage feed. Darkened comment count in homepage feed. Made some other miscellaneous text more visible.

Feb. 15, 2015 - Fixed Chrome not applying style unless disabled then re-enabled. Some minor tweaks to colors and spacing.

Feb. 14, 2015 - Changed thread and feed borders from dotted to solid lines. Made the Feed page dark.
